name: getReportingLandingPagesId
description: Get report of a landing page.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

$block: A summary of an individual landing page's settings and content.

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**clicks**: The number of clicks to this landing pages.
**conversion_rate**: The percentage of people who visited your landing page and were added to your list.
**ecommerce**
**average_order_revenue**: The average order revenue of this landing page.
**currency_code**: The user's currency code.
**total_orders**: The total number of orders associated with this landing page.
**total_revenue**: The total revenue of this landing page.
**id**: A string that uniquely identifies this landing page.
**list_id**: The list id connected to this landing page.
**list_name**: List Name
**name**: The name of this landing page the user will see.
**published_at**: The time this landing page was published.
**signup_tags**: A list of tags associated to the landing page.
**status**: The status of the landing page.
**subscribes**: The number of subscribes to this landing pages.
**timeseries**
**daily_stats**: The clicks and visits data from the last seven days.
**clicks**
**unique_visits**
**visits**
**weekly_stats**: The clicks and visits data from the last five weeks.
**clicks**: The total number of clicks in a week.
**unique_visits**
**visits**: The total number of visits in a week.
**title**: The name of the landing page the user's customers will see.
**unique_visits**: The number of unique visits to this landing pages.
**unpublished_at**: The time this landing page was unpublished.
**url**: The landing page url.
**visits**: The number of visits to this landing pages.
**web_id**: The ID used in the Mailchimp web application.

$block: An error generated by the Mailchimp API. Conforms to IETF draft 'draft-nottingham-http-problem-06'.

$ul: **detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
**instance**: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
**status**: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
**title**: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It shouldn't change based on the occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
**type**: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it should provide human-readable documentation for the problem type.
